message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can always negotiate further.
My turn. I'll take 65% this time.  It's important to reach a deal quickly with inflation eating our money.
Let's compromise. I'll take 80%, you get 20%. We can't keep this up, or we'll both lose a lot more.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  We're losing money every round we delay!
